title: Craig Burley brands Arsenal fans ‘spineless’ and Arsene Wenger ‘stale’ in incredible TV rant and rails against Champions League ‘mediocrity’
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CRAIG BURLEY is not a name you would put up there with Gary Neville and Robbie Savage for epic TV rants – until now. 
The former Scotland, Chelsea and Derby midfielder has a slot on American telly, with ESPN giving him the sofa and the soap box to say what he wants. ESPN 6 Craig Burley blasted Arsenal fans on ESPN 
And boy does he let rip on “spineless” Arsenal fans in this latest tirade, with “stale” Arsene Wenger also getting it in the neck.

He said on Burley’s Boiling Point: “It’s not just the performance against Chelsea which was embarrassing, it could have been five, it should have been more. The contrast between the teams was frightening. 
“The Arsenal fans are spineless, I’m telling you Arsenal fans, you are spineless, you are a mirror image of your team: weak, mentally weak. How can Arsenal fans continue to accept what they get every year? Getty Images 6 Some Arsenal fans have long protested at Arsene Wenger’s management of the side 
“What they pay for their ticket – and they follow their club across Europe and up and down England – and they accept the mediocrity by a club of that standard, getting in the top four. 
“And then they keep using the Champions League as some barometer for success. 
“Apart from the time they got to the final in Paris when Jens Lehmann got sent off, they’ve been knocked out in the round of 16 every time, what’s the point? “You’ve got a manager that’s stale, who is on £8million a year of whatever he’s on, you’ve got a board that make money. 
“But you’ve got supporters who allow it to happen. 
“If Arsenal fans don’t believe they’ve got a voice that can change that thinking, that mindset within the hierarchy, then they’re wrong. 
“As fans you can make that change, you can pressurise the board to think again, to pressurise the manager to think ‘I need to take a backseat and let somebody else get in.’ 
“Wenger: one, he’s getting paid well; and two he’s either too ignorant or arrogant to think he should not be moving on. PA:Press Association Craig Burley reckons Arsenal have been stale since 2004 when they won the title without losing a single game News Group Newspapers Ltd Craig Burley starred for Chelsea in the mid-90s News Group Newspapers Ltd 6 Craig Burley played for Celtic when in Scotland 
“Everybody else has been winning titles, Chelsea are winning titles, City are winning titles, United have won titles, Tottenham are above them. 
“Yet the fans are happy! 
“Arsene Wenger between 1996 and 2004 was amazing, absolutely amazing. But between 2004 and 2017 it is stale. 
“And yet the spineless Arsenal fans who go to the Emirates will not get up and voice their opinion and really stamp their feet and say ‘we want change.’ 
“They turn up, they pay their money, they whinge, they cry like a little baby then saunter off home and have a cry about it with their mates.” ESPN 6 Craig Burley has his own soapbox-style slot on ESPN 
It comes off the back of a Gunners fan Kane Hopps being branded an “idiot” by Sky Sports pundit Neville – before he hit back about the former Manchester United full-back turned media analyst, preaching from his “lofty perch.” 
Neville had a go at the fans on the YouTube channel Arsenal Fan TV, which gives a video platform to supporters after games. 
The hugely popular format has 332,000 subscribers, but Neville said: “I walked out of the Chelsea ground and there were Arsenal Fan TV cameras everywhere. 
“To be honest with you it was embarrassing listening to it and watching it. 
“I was watching Chelsea fans taking the mickey out of them, which was a little bit funny. 
“I was watching Arsenal fans slating and slanging into him [Arsene Wenger] and I thought ‘he doesn’t deserve that.”
